head.supplied: Bot. Garden 9/8/67. ¶ ¶ I came purposely back, dear Mr Manners-Sutton, to arrange about the gravelling and planting at Toorak. But I am far too weak to look to the details of the work personally & ha...

div.p: M67/64, unit 22 or 23, VPRS 1096 inward correspondence, VA 466 Governor, Public Record Office, Victoria.

look for reply in August.
Bot. Garden 9/8/67.

I came purposely back, dear Mr Manners-Sutton, to arrange about the gravelling and planting at Toorak. But I am far too weak to look to the details of the work personally & have therefore requested Mr Heyne, my Assistant, to wait on you to prepare an estimate of the work to be done, in order that such may at once be submitted to Mr Grant and the needful fund be placed at my disposal. Will you be so kind to cause to be shown to Mr Heyne the localities on which the improvements have to be effected.
